extendedInfo.description: Transform your mobile device in a set-square with Right Angle app.Through your camera, this app identifies a 90Â° angle between any two lines, creates a target and holds your screen.All you need is position the mark over the object you want to identify the 90Â° angle.Right Amgle is OpenCV based, it's an Intel Library for image processing and fully safe for you. Some apps based on OpenCV needs the user downloads OpenCV Manager, it's just accept when you run it at first time only once.More information in http://engcross.blogspot.com.br/search/label/Right%20AnglePage on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Eng-Cross-Apps/212207938932475
